shows.title: Every Dog Has Its Day
shows.plot_overview: Old Lin, a retired steel mill veteran with mobility issues, lives a materially comfortable yet emotionally desolate life. His routine is unexpectedly disrupted when he crosses paths with Ma Teng, an idle drifter brimming with "useless knowledge" and a chronic habit of abandoning projects midway, during a botched caregiver interview. What begins as a comedic clash of misunderstandings evolves into an extraordinary companionship. Through their unlikely journey bridging generational and social divi

shows.title: Musuh Dalam Selimut
shows.plot_overview: Tells the story of a household, Gadis and Andika, that was initially harmonious and happy. However, everything changes when a friend named Suzy arrives and begins to disturb that happiness.
